## Source: ossf-package-analysis (7dd0338a9ff4f006cf80fb43fe8dd3b5ed34ab8ff162dd64ff66d4be80a9a338)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'pagumagu' @ 9.9.9 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
